General.Description: Launched just for recently, Radon has been built on own source code. Moreover, its purpose to be the most transparent cryptocurrency in the ecosystem, the Radon is designing the web based that makes the crypto currency concept. Especially, the users are allowed to move of the crypto currency platform. Radon also provides many new features that grant total security and easy transparency.
General.Features: Radon gave the users the high security by using a password. In addition, the algorithm of Radon is  AES that means that all the file transaction will happen so fluently. Moreover, the transactions are described like a tree. At last, the Coin and file will be sent by Lantern.
General.Technology: Built as the next generation cryptocurrency from Scratch, Radon has been built their oen with its own source code, and designed to be entirely web based and will not be a fork of the Bitcoin client
